column4: mine isn't homework. It's just a theory I have. Nothing that HAS to get done. Just wanna do it that's all.
why is everyone so brainy? why can't i be brainy?
lol. I wouldn't let you waste your time ormandj. But thanks. :)
I said the other day that I would love to be more stoopid so I could be happier
that was more true when we all had 32M of RAM
wins! That makes much more sense than my idea :)
sometimes you want some functionality in iptables (IP masquerading for example) but it's not necessary for security
eh? Damn. This is all new to me. I have a lot to learn.
by default, ubuntu has no services listening to any ports anyway
if you set up a service, then you most likely don't want to immediately block its port by a firewall :)
I do have a website and an eggdrop in a chatroom. Will it help or hinder having the firewall?
you can use a firewall but then you will of course open the respective ports for those services to be useful
Thanks for the info :) I will have a play
